BR_text.BRsummary: Upload stack photo, thumbnails created only for main file.

comments_0.comment_text: Probably issues with reading the file, not sure why the 3x3 is created. We use it for color detection. Might be all black?

comments_1.comment_text: Marked this as a bug to investigate it further.

comments_2.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lastzero>@lastzero</denchmark-link>
  , After do "Complete Rescan", thumbnails will be create for that file.

comments_3.comment_text: Might be an issue with the importer then, the logic is quite complex.

comments_4.comment_text: Should be fixed with this commit. I'll take a look at some more issues and then start a new build for testing.

comments_5.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lastzero>@lastzero</denchmark-link>
  Hi, the problem already fixed, I can see thumbnail for all photo in stack.
 But here is another issue,
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16138783/99341195-6a79cb80-28c4-11eb-86ad-13e62cd59a51.png></denchmark-link>
 
 The real size is 540x720, width540 and height 720, in html it's reverse

comments_7.comment_text:
Expect this to be a metadata issue. Can you create a new ticket for this and add the full output of exiftool to it?
 <denchmark-code>exiftool -g -j FILENAME
 </denchmark-code>
 
 You may also send us the file for testing to <denchmark-link:mailto:hello@photoprism.org>hello@photoprism.org</denchmark-link>
  or attach it to your bug report.
